data.answer: To control the humidity of the atmosphere during the experiments

data.question: What is the role of the Dual site Langmuir-Freundlich (DSLF) model in the study of compound 1?
data.answer: To fit the single-component CO2 and N2 adsorption isotherms

data.question: Does the presence of water molecules in the pores of compound 1 affect its gas adsorption capacity?
Is the isosteric heat of CO2 adsorption on compound 1 obtained from the virial equation?
What is the significance of the IAST predicted isotherms for a binary mixture of CO2 and N2?
data.answer: To simulate the performance of compound 1 under a mixed component gas
